info.header: RSSAEGW064 - Create Session received cause code on S4
info.csv_title: Create Session received cause code on S4
info.help_text:
This report gives information about GTP-C v2 create session response messages sent per cause code on S4 interface (SGSN <- SGW).
Use case specific instructions:
- This report can be used to troubleshoot the 'Create Session Request received on S4 interface' messages;
- Note, 'Ratio' column is applicable on GV24 level only.
info.report-description: Create Session received cause code on S4
info.report-title: Create Session received cause code on S4
